value.description: 当前展开面板的name，非手风琴模式：[<String | Number>]，手风琴模式：String | Number
value.description_zh: 当前展开面板的name，非手风琴模式：[<String | Number>]，手风琴模式：String | Number

border.description: Whether to display the outer border

events.name: change
events.description: Triggered when the current active panel is expanded/closed (in accordion mode, the activeNames parameter is String, otherwise it is Array)
events.description_zh: 当前激活面板展开/关闭时触发(如果是手风琴模式，参数activeNames类型为String，否则为Array)

events.name: open
events.description: Triggered when the current active panel is expanded (in accordion mode, the activeNames parameter is String, otherwise it is Array)
events.description_zh: 当前激活面板展开时触发(如果是手风琴模式，参数activeNames类型为String，否则为Array)

events.name: close
events.description: Triggered when the current active panel is closed (if in accordion mode, the parameter activeNames is String, otherwise it is Array)
events.description_zh: 当前激活面板关闭时触发(如果是手风琴模式，参数activeNames类型为String，否则为Array)

methods.name: init
methods.description: Reinitialize the internal height calculation for asynchronous fetching of content, please use it in conjunction with this.$nextTick().
methods.description_zh: 重新初始化内部高度计算，用于异步获取内容的情形，请结合this.$nextTick()使用
